description: Client Financial Review (CFR) data extraction schema for comprehensive financial planning - Supports two clients

report_type.description: Type of report (e.g., 'Client Financial Review', 'Annual Review')

provider_name.description: Primary provider name associated with the document

report_date.description: Date the report was generated (YYYY-MM-DD format)

currency.description: Default currency for all monetary values in the document

regulatory_disclaimer_present.description: Indicates if a regulatory disclaimer is present in the document

has_client_2.description: Indicates whether second client data is present

personal_details.description: All personal details for the client

salutation.description: The name the client prefers to be called.

maiden_name.description: Client's surname at birth, if different.

dob.description: Client's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format.

marital_status.description: Client's marital status (e.g., Married, Single, Divorced).

made_a_will.description: Whether the client has made a will

risk_profile.description: Client's risk profile from 'Client Risk Profiling' section

Capacity For Loss.description: Client's capacity for loss rating (e.g., Low, Moderate, High)

Capacity For Loss Reason.description: The reasons for the capacity for loss rating

Capacity For Loss detail.description: Detailed explanation of capacity for loss

Investment Knowledge & Experience.description: Client's investment experience level (e.g., Limited, Moderate, Extensive)

Investment Knowledge & Experience Reason.description: Reason for the investment experience rating

relationship.description: Relationship to the client (e.g., Child, Spouse)

financially_dependent.description: Yes/No flag indicating if they are financially dependent

health_status.description: Brief description of the dependant's health status

date_moved_in.description: Date the client moved into their current home address.

previous_address.description: Client's previous address, if they have lived at the current one for less than 3 years.

correspondence_address.description: The address to be used for all correspondence.

health_and_occupation.description: Client's health status and employment details

smoker.description: Whether the client has used tobacco products in the last 12 months

good_health.description: Whether the client considers themselves in good health

medical_conditions.description: Whether the client has any known medical conditions

hazardous_hobbies.description: Whether the client has hazardous hobbies or occupation

job_title.description: Client's specific job title (e.g., Principle Product Manager).

employer.description: Name of the client's employer or business.

employment_status.description: Client's employment status (e.g., Full-time Employed, Not Working).

category.description: The source or type of income.

description.description: More specific description (e.g., Salary, Bonus, P11D benefits)

amount.description: The monetary value of the income, typically per annum total gross

frequency.description: How often income is received (e.g., Annually, Monthly)

taxable.description: Indicates if the income is taxable (Yes/No)

frequency.description: How often the expenditure occurs (e.g., Monthly)

disposable_income.description: Client's disposable income and emergency fund information

monthly_disposable.description: The client's total monthly net income minus total monthly expenditure.

emergency_fund_available.description: The amount of funds the client has available for emergencies.

emergency_fund_recommended.description: The recommended minimum amount for the client's emergency fund.

future_circumstances.description: Expected changes to client's financial circumstances

expect_change.description: A Yes/No flag indicating if the client expects their financial circumstances to change in the next 5 years.

change_details.description: Details of any expected changes to financial circumstances.

tax_and_residence.description: Client's tax status and residency information

highest_rate_percent.description: The client's highest marginal rate of income tax.

uk_resident_for_tax.description: A Yes/No flag indicating if the client is a UK resident for tax purposes.

domiciled_in_uk.description: A Yes/No flag indicating if the client is domiciled or deemed domiciled in the UK for tax purposes.

tax_status_change_expected.description: A Yes/No flag indicating if the client expects their tax status to change in the future.

liabilities.description: List of client's liabilities and debts

type.description: Type of liability (e.g., Repayment Mortgage, Interest Only Mortgage)

outstanding_amount.description: Total amount of liability remaining to be paid

term_remaining_years.description: Number of years left on the term

repayment_method.description: Method of repayment (e.g., Capital repayment, interest only)

type.description: Type of policy (e.g., Life, Critical Illness, Income Protection)

sum_assured.description: Amount payable on a valid claim

status.description: Current status of the policy (e.g., In Force)

Scheme Type.description: Type of pension scheme (e.g., Money Purchase Scheme)

Provider.description: Name of the pension provider (e.g., Standard Life, Aegon)

Valuation.description: Current monetary value or valuation of the pension plan

Owner.description: Owner of the pension (e.g., Client 1, Client 2)

Plan Type.description: Type of pension plan (e.g., Group Personal Pension Uncrystallised)

Employer contributions.description: Monthly contribution made to the pension by the client's employer

Status.description: Current status of the plan (e.g., In Force, Paid up)

Plan retirement age.description: The retirement age on this specific pension plan

Frequency (Contributions).description: The frequency the contributions will be paid (Monthly, Yearly)

Policy number.description: Unique identifier for the pension plan

Transfer value.description: Current value that will be paid on a transfer

Member of scheme.description: Yes/No flag indicating if client is a member of the scheme

Employer sponsored scheme available.description: Yes/No flag indicating if employer sponsored scheme is available

source_pages.description: Page numbers where this pension information was found

Category.description: Category of asset (e.g., Cash-based Investment, Property Assets)

Type of asset/holding.description: Detailed type of asset (e.g., Property - Residential)

Valuation.description: Estimated monetary value of the asset

In trust.description: Yes/No flag indicating if asset is held in trust

Relief or exemption applicable.description: Any tax relief or exemption applicable to the asset

source_pages.description: Page numbers where this asset information was found

provider.description: Name of institution where holding is held

policy_number.description: Account or policy number for the holding

type.description: Type of investment holding (e.g., ISA - Stocks and Shares, GIA)

value.description: Current monetary value of the holding

source_pages.description: Page numbers where this holding information was found

vulnerability_flag.description: Indicates if a client is registered or considered potentially vulnerable (e.g., Potential, No).

health_reasons.description: Vulnerability reasons related to health (e.g., Severe or long-term illness).

life_event_reasons.description: Vulnerability reasons related to life events (e.g., Relationship breakdown).

resilience_reasons.description: Vulnerability reasons related to financial resilience (e.g., Inadequate income).

capability_reasons.description: Vulnerability reasons related to financial capability (e.g., Low knowledge).

client_2.description: Secondary client information (if has_client_2 is true). Structure mirrors client_1 exactly

salutation.description: The name the client prefers to be called.

medical_conditions.description: A Yes/No flag indicating if the client suffers from any known medical conditions.

hazardous_hobbies.description: A Yes/No flag indicating if the client has hazardous hobbies or a hazardous occupation.

job_title.description: Client's specific job title (e.g., Principle Product Manager).

employment_status.description: Client's employment status (e.g., Full-time Employed, Not Working).

provider.description: Name of institution where holding is held

policy_number.description: Account or policy number for the holding

type.description: Type of investment holding (e.g., ISA - Stocks and Shares, GIA)

value.description: Current monetary value of the holding

source_pages.description: Page numbers where this holding information was found

vulnerability_flag.description: Indicates if a client is registered or considered potentially vulnerable (e.g., Potential, No).

health_reasons.description: Vulnerability reasons related to health (e.g., Severe or long-term illness).

life_event_reasons.description: Vulnerability reasons related to life events (e.g., Relationship breakdown).

resilience_reasons.description: Vulnerability reasons related to financial resilience (e.g., Inadequate income).

capability_reasons.description: Vulnerability reasons related to financial capability (e.g., Low knowledge).

last_cfr_review_date.description: Date of the last Confidential Financial Review (YYYY-MM-DD)

partner_disclosure_notes.description: Will include the Date of the last Disclosure (Date of SCDD)

client_disclosure_complete.description: Indicates if the client completed full disclosure of information (Yes/No)

client_disclosure_reason.description: Explanation for why full disclosure was not completed, if applicable

capacity_for_loss.description: Client's capacity for loss rating (Low, Moderate, High)

capacity_for_loss_reason.description: The Reasons for the capacity for loss rating

capacity_for_loss_detail.description: Detailed explanation of capacity for loss

investment_experience.description: Client's investment experience level (Limited, Moderate, Extensive)

investment_experience_reason.description: Reason for the investment experience rating

retirement_planning.description: Retirement planning goals and risk attitudes

client_priorities.description: Detailed summary of client's retirement goals

pre_retirement_risk.description: Client's attitude to risk for pre-retirement funding

at_retirement_risk_attitude.description: Attitude to risk for options at retirement

accept_reduce_income.description: Yes/No if prepared to accept reduction in income

accept_reduce_fund.description: Yes/No if prepared to accept reduction in fund value

accept_reduce_death_benefits.description: Yes/No if prepared to accept reduction in death benefits

employer_scheme.description: Do you have an employer sponsored scheme available (YES/NO)

which_type_of_scheme_available.description: Money Purchase Scheme, Final Salary, etc.

are_you_in_waiting_period.description: Indicates if in a waiting period to join a scheme (YES/NO)

are_you_member_of_scheme.description: Are you a member of the scheme (YES/NO)

investment_planning.description: Investment planning objectives and tax allowances

explain_why_timeframe_appropriate.description: Reason why the investment horizon is appropriate

attitude_to_risk.description: Attitude to risk for investment planning

is_there_specific_target_amount.description: Whether there is a specific target amount

target_date.description: When the target amount is required

st_jamess_place_plans.description: Unified array of ALL St. James's Place plans, products, pensions, ISAs, bonds, and investments. Every SJP product must be captured ONLY in this array - one object per distinct plan.

plan_name.description: Name or description of the plan

plan_type.description: Type of plan (e.g., 'SIPP', 'Stocks & Shares ISA', 'Investment Bond', 'Pension')

plan_start_date.description: Start date of the plan (ISO date format if available)

risk_profile.description: Risk profile assigned to this plan

notes.description: Additional notes specific to this plan

source_pages.description: Page numbers in the source document where this plan information was found

notes.description: Additional notes and comments about the client
